body.name: Evenflo Pivot Xpand Modular Travel System with LiteMax Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar (Sabino Gray)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 20 mins
features: MAKE IT A DOUBLE: The easy slide and lock system expands the frame in seconds to accommodate a second toddler or infant seat without tools, extra parts or adapters
SWITCH IT UP: Toddler seat transitions to lay flat carriage mode, allowing baby to stretch out, while the adjustable canopy offers three heights to fit kids up to 43 in.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR RIDE: Accommodates one or two riders with up to 23 configurations in the USA, in forward-facing or parent-facing mode with infant car seat directly on the frame and a toddler seat that converts to carriage mode — Pivot Xpand has all the “xtras” you need as your family grows!
PROTECT PRECIOUS CARGO: LiteMax Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar absorbs and dissipates crash forces to help provide additional stability and to give you peace of mind
STROLL EFFORTLESSLY: Large cruiser tires with front-wheel swivel and rear-wheel suspension ensure a smooth ride

ACCESSORIZE IT: Stroller is compatible with the Evenflo Stroller Child Snack Tray with Snack Cup, Stroller Rider Board and Infant Car Seat Adapter, and the Pivot Xpand Stroller Market Basket (all sold separately)
body.description: The Evenflo® Pivot Xpand™ Modular Travel System with LiteMax™ Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar easily transitions from a single to double stroller without adapters or tools — simply slide up and ﬂip out the integrated seat mounts to add a toddler seat! Attach two toddler seats, two infant car seats, or one of each. Designed for ultimate ﬂexibility, the frame accommodates up to 23 conﬁgurations in the USA for infant and toddler seating at various heights in both parent-facing and forward-facing modes. Your little one will enjoy stretching out in carriage mode or sitting up tall with a heightened canopy. From one to two, the Pivot Xpand grows with your family! This versatile travel system helps baby feel comfortable for all your adventures. Serious about storage, the Pivot Xpand’s extra-large, easy-access basket expands to over 2 feet in length to hold a diaper bag, plus whatever else you need for the day! When not in use, the Pivot Xpand folds compactly with the toddler seat attached and self-stands for convenience. Find the most comfortable position for your child with a 3-position reclining toddler seat and 6-position adjustable footrest. Large cruiser tires with front-wheel swivel and rear-wheel suspension provide a smooth ride and superior maneuverability. The ﬂip-ﬂop friendly rear brake safely locks wheels in place as you take your child in and out of the stroller. The large canopy shields against sun, wind and rain and a peek-a-boo window keeps baby visible at all times. The canopy’s adjustable height allows you to accommodate baby’s growth spurts. Parents will enjoy a 4-position adjustable handle, removable bumper bar, and ﬂex-hold cup holder that ﬁts a variety of beverage sizes to help avoid spills. The Pivot Xpand Modular Travel System comes with the LiteMax Infant Car Seat with an Anti-Rebound Bar that absorbs and dissipates crash forces to help provide additional stability and give you peace of mind. An integrated belt lock-off system, multi-position base and recline indicator help you properly install the car seat. At Evenflo, we go above and beyond government standards to create car seats that are safe. The Evenflo LiteMax Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards. It is structural integrity tested at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard, and it is side-impact tested, rollover tested and temperature tested. If you need help installing your car seat, our ParentLink® customer service experts offer help online in real time. Get live video support with a certified car seat safety technician to ensure proper vehicle installation, so you can drive with confidence knowing your child is protected. It's been 100 years and Evenflo continues to push the boundaries in baby and children's gear design and innovation. We meet the needs of new generations of parents by focusing on what they really care about: leading-edge safety, smart design and technology, and convenient features that help them enjoy the journey of parenthood.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Clean minor spills and stains on cloth, vinyl or plastic surfaces with cold water and mild soap. Air dry. On models with removable seat pads, machine wash them separately in cold water–delicate cycle. NO chlorine bleach. Tumble dry 10 – 15 minutes on low heat, remove immediately. DO NOT iron or dry clean. Metal and plastic parts can be wiped clean with a soft damp cloth and dried with a soft cloth. DO NOT use abrasive cleaners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously the best system
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my niece and the system is amazing. Easy to use and so versatile. I would recommend this car seat/stroller system to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my new granddaughter. It is very versatile and sturdy. Great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expansion capability for planners
reviews.reviewText: Expands to a two toddler eventually for planners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and versatile
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to assemble out of the box, came with all the pieces and accessories necessary, which was a small concern ordering over the internet. The fabric and color are nice and modern and easy to clean. I like the extra storage space on the bottom and the fact that a second seat can be added. This is an infant car seat, so I will need to upgrade at some point. But the system as a whole is very functionable and seems safe, I am hoping to pass it down and that it lasts a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For Parents on the Go
reviews.reviewText: This travel system is an absolute game-changer for parents on the go. The safety features of the stroller are top-notch. The inclusion of an anti-rebound bar provides additional stability and protection in case of impact which gives me peace of mind knowing that my little one is safe and secure during our travels. The design makes it very convenient. It allows for multiple configurations, easily accommodating a growing family or additional passengers. The materials used are sturdy and durable, the wheels provide a smooth ride, and the adjustable handlebar makes it comfortable for parents of different heights which is very appreciated! There is ample storage in the basket under the stroller, and assembling and folding the stroller is a breeze. It's compact and easy to store, making it ideal for both daily use and travel. Absolutely love this stroller, it's worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this item was terrible. The item was used and was missing the car seat. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best travel system ever!
reviews.reviewText: I'm obsessed with this travel system from Evenflo, it's seriously the best! It's easy to assemble and everything snaps right into place. I love how you can transition the stroller in a variety of ways to fit your needs, and that it grows with your baby. It's high quality, heavy duty, and very sturdy. It maneuvers smoothly and is pretty lightweight and easy to push around. The car seat and stroller are both padded very well with lots of cushion, so baby and toddler are always super comfortable. It has a large canopy that can be adjusted to different sizes , and the storage basket is huge and has a lot of space. It's totally worth the price and a great investment. My toddler and baby love that they can ride together in the same stroller. If your looking for a travel system, this is the one to get. Overall very satisfied and would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic value- easy to use. Might be the best carseat stroller combo!
reviews.reviewText: The stroller is very modular (you can reverse the bassinet and the car seat). The whole thing is very sturdy- I don't worry about it breaking or failing in any way really.The collapsing system is really good. As shown in the picture, the stroller itself collapses down for very efficient storage.The push bar is adjustable in height (for different operator height preferences).The car seat is extremely easy to remove from the car seat holder and from the stroller (it's just one large button on the back). Very convenient.The bassinet is a little more difficult to remove than the car seat is, but still not a hassle.The stroller is easy to push, and the wheels feel like the plastic will last for a long time.The space beneath the stroller is plentiful. You'll be able to easily fit almost any diaper bag under there.Overall, it's just a really, really good combo. It will likely be cheaper than buying a stroller and a car seat separately, and you still get all the quality that you want.And, if you're planning on having more than one child, you can transport both at once (the infant in the car seat and the toddler in the bassinet in seat mode in the front). See last attached photo.Great value, great quality. An all around 'WOW'.
